messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] raising dogs ~An Apology
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I apologize for answering the post that was about raising dogs. It does not have a thing to do with unschooling. The only reason I mentioned raising dogs
messages.messageBody:
Hi, I apologize for answering the post that was about raising dogs. It does
not have a thing to do with unschooling. The only reason I mentioned raising
dogs to start with is because it is what my kids are interested in and the
dog's care has a big impact on our day. I could have used bmx racing and my
kids devotion to that, guess I did not think that the dog raising would raise
a problem. It was not the point of my post. I did not wish to start a
discussion on the welfare of animals or on my family.

Back to unschooling ...
peace and grace
Candy
